message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I believe you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $9,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $8,500 right now.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product. What do you think?
Alice, I understand you're looking for $9,500, but I'm still only able to offer $8,750.  It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.  What do you say?
